title: Myo-inositol affects the health, metabolome, and lactation performance of peripartum dairy cows.
abstract: Yeast culture (YC) has become a crucial microecological preparation for regulating the ruminal environment and improving ruminant health.Myo-inositol is an effective substance in YC, our study aimed to investigate whethermyo-inositol can regulate metabolism and influence the health of dairy cows. Therefore, this study explored the effects ofmyo-inositol on the health, metabolome, and lactation performance of peripartum dairy cows using bothin vitroandin vivomodels.
